page.title: 11WAR DECLARED ON SHOPLIFTERS
page.content: PEOPLE IN THANET AREA HAVE BEEN VERY ANNOYED ABOUT THE WAY SHOPLIFTERS ARE COSTING THEM A SMALL FORTUNE TO REPLACE STOLEN GOODS. THE CHAMBER OF COMMERCE PRESIDENT SAID "IF I HAD MY WAY THE HANDS OF EVERY SHOPLIFTER WOULD BE CUT OFF". THE SHOP OWNERS ALSO FEAR THAT SHOPLIFTING WILL INCREASE AS THE SUMMER DRAWS NEARER. MARGATE CHAMBER OF COMMERCE THINKS THAT THE MAIN PROBLEM OF SHOPLIFTING IS THE AMOUNT OF UNEMPLOYMENT.PEOPLE WHO SEE SOMETHING THEY WANT AND CANNOT AFFORD IT TAKE THE EASY WAY OUT AND STEAL IT. THE POLICE BELIEVE THAT THE PUBLIC SHOULD ALWAYS INFORM SOMEONE IF THEY SEE ANYTHING SUSPICIOUS.
